# <a name="add-a-holiday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f5d6c-102">Tambahkan Kalender liburan di Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f5d6c-102">Add a holiday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f5d6c-103">Di bagian bawah halaman, pilih ikon kalender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f5d6c-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f5d6c-104">[buka kalender](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f5d6c-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f5d6c-105">Pada panel kiri, pilih **Tambah kalender** > **Menarik kalender** > **liburan**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f5d6c-105">In the left pane, select **Add calendar** > **Interesting Calendars** > **Holidays**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f5d6c-106">Pilih Kalender liburan yang Anda inginkan dan kemudian pilih **X** di sudut atas untuk menyimpan pilihan Anda dan menutup jendela **Tambah kalender** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f5d6c-106">Select the holiday calendar you want and then select **X** in the top corner to save your choice and close the **Add calendar** window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f5d6c-107">Pelajari lebih lanjut [menambahkan atau menghapus kalender ulang tahun dan liburan](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f5d6c-107">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
